java.lang.Object

public class Bit
extends MagicItem

Method Detail

getQrImage

public String getQrImage()
Returns the string URL for this bit's QR Code. The Drawable may be fetched using AndroidCoffeeShopService.getImageFromURL(String) or ca.ubc.magic.icd.android.services.AndroidCoffeeShopService#getQRCode()

Returns:
the URL of this bit's QR Code.
See Also:
AndroidCoffeeShopService.getImageFromURL(String), ca.ubc.magic.icd.android.services.AndroidCoffeeShopService#getQRCode(String)

public void setQrImage(String qrImage)

Parameters:
qrImage - the URL for a QR Code.
